about_the_game:
After a corporate starship crash, the crew is stranded on a harsh alien planet where, each night, the Rot rises from the ground — a mysterious phenomenon that destroys everything it can reach. To survive, the locals build elevated shelters known as ‘nightholds.’

Outsmart rival human camps, fight for resources, and seize cryptic ancient technologies left behind by a lost civilization. Search for a functioning escape pod to send a distress signal, but remember — in this brutal world, survival always comes first.

Open World, Endless Possibilities

Plunge into a fully destructible open world where every action leaves a mark. Explore dynamic environments shaped by realistic weather and fire systems — set a building ablaze, and watch it burn to the ground. Craft, cook, fish, and interact with NPCs who build their own camps and respond to your decisions. Form alliances, complete quests, or annihilate anyone who stands in your way. The world is alive, and your fate depends on how you engage with it.

Build by Day, Survive by Night

The day is your time to prepare: gather resources, craft tools and weapons, and fortify your Nighthold. But when night falls, the Rot emerges, infecting enemies, buildings, and even people around you. Defend against rotten enemies and control this mighty infection to turn the tide in your favour — or succumb to it yourself.

Together or Alone

Survive solo or team up with friends in seamless cross-platform co-op play. Work together to build, explore, and conquer the night — or face the challenges of this unforgiving world on your terms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and later versions
  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics Card supported shader 4.0

short_description: Build shelters, interact with rescuees, battle against the Rot and raiders to survive another night in this Sandbox RPG. Play Solo or team up with friends in Online Сo-op.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
